name: We Have To Cook
description:
We have to cook is a short game about a cook that needs to venture through a dungeon in search of the best ingredients, in order to cook different recipes for his customers.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys for movement;

Z / J for interact;

X / K for attack;

Team

Damien Ribeiro

João Vareta

Lucas Cruz
